question: What common themes are found in the social media strategies of data scientists who lead initiatives in companies emphasizing digital transformation?

subtasks.task: Identify data scientists leading initiatives in companies focusing on digital transformation. [PersonaUser, CompanyFocusAreaDetail]
Gather social media posts from these data scientists to analyze their strategies. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
Determine the common themes in their social media activity. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
